page.title: 18CHILDREN'S PLACES OF BIRTH.
page.content: The survey was carried out on 117 middle school children(aged 9-12) at Budbrooke Combined school.We asked where their parents lived when the children were born.There were many different places so we had to break them down.We ended up with 6 areas.We added the total in each area and expressed the result as a percentage. They are: Parish of Budbrooke....55% Up to 10 Km away.......14% Between 10 and 50 Km....9% Rest of Britain........17% Europe..................2% Rest of world...........3% 115 of the children are British.2 are Japanese.95%lived in Britain,1 in Wales rest in England.
